title: Inside Gamergate with James Desborough
description:
A few months ago I posed the question on twitter "What actually happened with gamergate?" and I was introduced to James "Grim" Desborough who wrote a book on the subject. We discuss all that gamergate entailed, from moral panics to women in tech.

Grim's Book: https://www.amazon.com/Inside-Gamergate-Social-History-Revolt-ebook/dp/B074PC6318

And here: https://post-mort.com/products/inside-gamergate-a-social-history-of-the-gamer-revolt?_pos=1&_sid=a88e92db1&_ss=r

Other sources for gamergate info: http://deepfreeze.it

Follow Grim on twitter @Grimasaur

Follow me:
twitter: @theother_95
Instagram: @theother95
Facebook: @theother95page
Email me: theotherninetyfive@gmail.com
